GeneDef.label: anti-power (Durability)
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene can use their weakness as an indescriminate weapon against everyone around them.\n\nMultiple anti-super abilities can be triggered back to back, which allows them to stack. However, this will not delay the comatose state, and in fact may make it happen sooner.
